overview: The C-Men are back! Our handsome heroes are on the tail of Panting Patty and her diabolical Fanny! These screaming harlots will get on all fours and drive you mad! It's another race against time as the guys hustle to save the world! What will happen? Find out in the second installment of "C-Men," Fanny…Fanny-packed with action!
tagline: They're out to save the world…one ass at a time!
title: C-Men 2: Fanny Force
